46//*****************************************************************************
47#ifndef AM_REG_BASE_ADDRESSES_H
48#define AM_REG_BASE_ADDRESSES_H
49
50#include "stdint.h"
51
52//
53// The following table is based on maximum memory sizing of Apollo330P,
54// specific SKUs may vary.
55// ****************************************************************************
56// RAM and NVRAM Memory Map:
57// ITCM: None
58// NVM (MRAM): 2MB 0x00400000 - 0x005FFFFF
59// MSPIx External memory: varies 0x60000000 - 0x8FFFFFFF
60// DTCM: 256KB 0x20000000 - 0x2003FFFF
61// System SRAM: 1.768MB 0x20080000 - 0x2023FFFF
62// ****************************************************************************
63
64//
65// DTCM address space.
66//
67#define DTCM_BASEADDR (0x20000000UL)
68#define DTCM_MAX_SIZE (256UL * 1024UL)
69
70//
71// The Apollo5 maximum SSRAM space is 1.768MB.
72//
73#define SSRAM_BASEADDR (0x20080000)
74#define SSRAM_MAX_SIZE (1792UL * 1024UL)
75
76// ****************************************************************************
77// MRAM Address Space
78// ****************************************************************************
79#define MRAM_BASEADDR (0x00400000UL)
80#define MRAM_MAX_SIZE (2048UL * 1024UL)
81
82// ****************************************************************************
83// INFO base addresses
84// ****************************************************************************
85#define AM_REG_INFO0_BASEADDR 0x42000000
86#define AM_REG_INFO1_BASEADDR 0x42002000
87#define AM_REG_OTP_INFO0_BASEADDR 0x42004000
88#define AM_REG_OTP_INFO1_BASEADDR 0x42006000
89#define AM_REG_OTP_INFOC_BASEADDR 0x400C2000
90
91//
92// INFO sizes
93//
94#define AM_REG_INFO0_SIZE 2048
95#define AM_REG_INFO1_SIZE 6144
96#define AM_REG_INFOC_SIZE 8192
97#define AM_REG_OTP_INFO0_SIZE 256
98#define AM_REG_OTP_INFO1_SIZE 2816
99#define AM_REG_OTP_INFOC_SIZE 1024
100
101
102// ****************************************************************************
103// MSPI aperture address ranges
104// ****************************************************************************
105//
106// Please note that the END_ADDR as used here is actually the (end address + 1).
107//
108#define MSPI0_XIP_BASEADDR (0x60000000UL)
109#define MSPI1_XIP_BASEADDR (0x80000000UL)
110#define MSPI2_XIP_BASEADDR (0x84000000UL)
111
112#define MSPI0_APERTURE_START_ADDR (0x60000000UL)
113#define MSPI0_APERTURE_END_ADDR (0x70000000UL)
114#define MSPI1_APERTURE_START_ADDR (0x80000000UL)
115#define MSPI1_APERTURE_END_ADDR (0x84000000UL)
116#define MSPI2_APERTURE_START_ADDR (0x84000000UL)
117#define MSPI2_APERTURE_END_ADDR (0x88000000UL)
118
119#endif // AM_REG_BASE_ADDRESSES_H
